title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 08 July 2015 - XWiki

14:00 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
14:04 <Trefex> has quit  
14:22 <cjd> Does anybody know a trick to get a JS Extension registered as "always on this wiki" without requiring programming rights ?   (I'm the owner of the subwiki)  
14:24 <cjd> Maybe I can hook an extension point which is ~always called and use velocity to pull the JSX from there ?  
14:26 <tmortagne> indeed JS extension right checking should probably be changed to reflect the rules applied in other places like translations, uiextensions, etc  
14:28 <cjd> yeah, I can create a jira for that but it's a pain because we still have to find a solution for developing our extension even after it's fixed because of backward compat  
14:39 <cjd> http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-12285  
14:40 <lucaa> has quit  
14:47 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
14:48 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
14:49 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
14:50 <msmeria1> has quit  
14:55 <vmassol> guys, in editinline.vm there's a hidden param for xredirect and it seems it's modified from some javascript, would anyone know where this js is?  
15:00 <sdumitriu1> has quit

16:09 <vmassol> gdelhumeau:  re data-xwiki-space meta is this going to represent the full nested space?  
16:09 <gdelhumeau> I beleive it must be like doc.getSpace()  
16:09 <vmassol> data-xwiki-space="A.B.C" or data-xwiki-space="C"  
16:09 <vmassol> ?  
16:10 <gdelhumeau> so A.B.C  
16:10 <vmassol> ok then we'll have some js code to update too  
16:10 <vmassol> creating one jira  
16:11 <gdelhumeau> we jave  
16:11 <gdelhumeau> \*have  
16:12 <gdelhumeau> too generic maybe  
16:12 <gdelhumeau> http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-12205#  
16:12 <vmassol> ah ok thanks, was about to hit create ;)  
16:12 <vmassol> yeah it's too generic probably  
16:13 <vmassol> but I'll reuse it for now  
16:18 <Trefex> has joined #xwiki  
16:29 <gsmeria1> has quit  
16:32 <lucaa> has quit  
16:33 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: not sure if it's your change or not  
16:33 <vmassol> but the top level menu is behaving strangely  
16:33 <vmassol> for example when typing: http://localhost:8080/xwiki/bin/view/Test  
16:34 <vmassol> it shows Test.WebHome as the space  
16:34 <gdelhumeau> it's not due to my change  
16:34 <gdelhumeau> I've noticed it this morning  
16:34 <vmassol> the edit link works too  
16:34 <vmassol> but the Edit button also fails for some reason  
16:34 <vmassol> (I was sure it was working before but maybe not)  
16:34 <vmassol> (before = a few days ago)  
16:35 <vmassol> actually no  
16:35 <vmassol> the edit link doesn't work anymore either  
16:35 <gdelhumeau> look at the difference between http://localhost:8080/xwiki/bin/view/Test/Test and http://localhost:8080/xwiki/bin/view/Test/Test/  
16:35 <vmassol> so someone changed something  
16:35 <vmassol> since I committed http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-12262  
16:35 <vmassol> so Monday or Tuesday  
16:37 <vmassol> debugging quickly my code in XWikiAction that does the redirect  
16:37 <vmassol> but it should redirect to Test.WebHome normally  
16:38 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
16:38 <vmassol> guys wdyt about stopping coding new stuff tomorrow so that we keep Friday for fixing the build to be able to release on Monday?  
16:43 <vmassol> ok found a problem  
16:44 <vmassol> debugging  
16:45 <tmortagne> vmassol: sure  
16:55 <vmassol> seems it was me who introduced a bug in my second refactoring of XWIKI-12262 fixing  
16:55 <vmassol> thanks evalica  
16:55 <vmassol>  for reporting  
17:01 <evalica> np - great you found it  
17:04 <lucaa> has quit  
17:04 <lucaa1> has joined #xwiki  
17:14 <vmassol> fixing build  
17:14 <vmassol> ah yes I didn't build the legacy project that's why I didn't notice it  
17:14 <vmassol> (I was slightly surprised TBH)
